parse

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
	"context"
	"encore.dev/types/option"
)

type MyParams struct {
    Query option.Option[string] `query:"foo"`
    Header option.Option[string] `header:"foo"`
    Body option.Option[string]
}

//encore:api public path=/str
func Str(ctx context.Context, p *MyParams) (*MyParams, error) { return nil, nil }
